<!-- Music Generation App - Copilot Instructions -->

## Project Overview
Music generation application using:
- DiffRhythm2 for music generation with built-in vocals
- MuQ-MuLan for music style encoding
- Fish Speech for TTS (optional)

## Architecture
- Backend: Python with Flask
- Frontend: Web-based HTML/CSS/JS with DAW-style timeline
- Horizontal track-based clip management
- Configurable clip duration (10-120 seconds)
- Export/download functionality

## Development Guidelines
- Follow Python best practices (PEP 8)
- Include comprehensive error handling
- Implement logging throughout
- Use type hints where applicable
- Document all API endpoints
- Write modular, testable code
